attributes.action: Legalise marijuana in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: Drug crime numbers are increasing again by legalising marijuana the numbers will drop as marijuana is a big part of drug crime to this date. If the government was able to legalise marijuana they would be able to quality control what's happening with it so its not harmful and just gives you the normal CBD effect and the high.
attributes.background: Relook at marijuana legalisation as more information about it has been open to us by researching. The government will be able to tax marijuana just like tobacco.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614503
